Kidnappable

Speaking to a friend from Colombia last night, I discovered a new word: *kidnappable*. Actually, the word she told me was in Spanish: *secuestrable*, but doing a Google search, I discover that the word is already being used in English, although it only gets a 175 hits, and only a few of those are in the sense of the word that my friend told me. ...
